# Utkast felles dashboard

```{python}
from google.cloud.bigquery import Client
import plotly.graph_objects as go

project = "arbeidsgiver-data-prod-bb88"
bq_client = Client(project)

query = "select * from `pia-prod-85b2.pia_bigquery_sink_v1_dataset_prod.pia_til_po_felles_dashboard`"
df_pia = bq_client.query(query=query).to_dataframe()
```

## Row
```{python}
#| title: Antall opprettet og fullført behovsvurdering i Fia
fig = go.Figure()
fig = fig.add_trace(
    go.Scatter(
        x=df_pia.maaned,
        y=df_pia.antall_opprettet_behovsvurdering,
        mode="lines+markers",
        name="Opprettet behovsvurdering"
    )
)
fig = fig.add_trace(
    go.Scatter(
        x=df_pia.maaned,
        y=df_pia.antall_fullfort_behovsvurdering,
        mode="lines+markers",
        name="Fullført behovsvurdering"
    )
)
fig = fig.update_layout(
    xaxis_title="Måned",
    yaxis_title="Antall"
)
fig.show()
```
